page.title: 13Trade.
page.content: Shops are scattered throughout the village.These cater for our everyday needs.Atkinsons is a busy family bakery.The early morning smell of their freshly baked bread attracts customers.Marlones is a large shoe shop which sells bags,socks,legwarmers and pomanders.Bobby Dazzlers is a clothes shop selling bracelets and other accessories too.Pet Stores is the only local place which sells fishing tackle as well as most pet accessories and food.Fishlake Shop and Post Office sells almost everything.It is in part of an attractive old warehouse,close to the old River Don.
